name: Introduction to Hindi/Urdu
description: Intensive introduction to phonology, grammar, syntax of the modern Hindi and Urdu language; emphasis on basic writing and reading. [72L, 24P] NOTE: All students who are enrolling in a HIN language course for the first time (do not have the prerequisite) are required to complete a language assessment questionnaire. Students who have not completed an assessment cannot be approved for course enrolment. Please visit www.utm.utoronto.ca/language-studies/elective-languages for further details.
exclusions: NEW212Y1or higher/SAS 202Y1 or higher/LGGA70H3, LGGA71H3/Native users.
